title: BPSC Boiler Inspector Online Form 2026
description: BPSC Boiler Inspector Recruitment 2026: Apply Online for 05 Post Post Update Date: 13-01-2026 Short Description: BPSC Boiler Inspector Recruitment 2026: Bihar Public Service Commission (BPSC) has released Advertisement No. 06/2026 for the recruitment of Boiler Inspector Under Labour Resources Dept., Govt. of Bihar . Eligible candidates can apply online from 13 January 2026 . The last date to apply online and pay the examination fee is 03 February 2026 . The examination will be conducted as pe...
